Articles.Content:
This is my first mod release and it is nothing special. Simply a decoupler with monopropellant tanks stored inside.

![2.jpg](http://i1112.photobucket.com/albums/k492/dearranged/2.jpg)

![1.jpg](http://i1112.photobucket.com/albums/k492/dearranged/1.jpg)

Mod is available from [Kerbal Stuff](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1027/JSC%20Monopropellant%20Decoupler)

Released under CC-BY-SA
Ooh, handy! This looks pretty useful, thanks for making it so we can save on part count.
Could you do an 1.25 one too ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) i like this.

> 
> Could you do an 1.25 one too ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) i like this.

I concur!

An odd little combination, but could probably be used cleverly in an orbiter or launcher. Sold. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Gratz on making your first mod. I hope you do more.
cool! I bet this could come in handy on recoverable launchers.
